TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IButtonControl

Docs.summary: Defines properties and events that must be implemented to allow a control to act like a button on a Web page.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface defines the properties and events that must be implemented to allow a control to act like a button on a Web page.
The members of this interface provide basic button functionality, such as the ability to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Click> event and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A> property provides cross-page posting functionality.

block.para: Implement this interface in classes that act like button controls on Web pages.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CausesValidation : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking the button causes page validation to occur.
Docs.value: if clicking the button causes page validation to occur; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CausesValidation%2A> property to indicate whether clicking the button causes page validation to occur.

Docs.summary: Occurs when the button control is clicked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Click> event is raised when the button control is clicked.
For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

Docs.summary: Occurs when the button control is clicked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event is raised when the button control is clicked.
For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CommandArgument { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CommandArgument : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an optional argument that is propagated to the event.
Docs.value: The argument that is propagated to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandArgument%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property to indicate the argument and command name that are propagated to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CommandName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CommandName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the command name that is propagated to the event.
Docs.value: The name of the command that is propagated to the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandArgument%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property to indicate the argument and command name that are propagated to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PostBackUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PostBackUrl : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.
Docs.value: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A> property to perform a cross-page post. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A> property is set to the page that the button is currently on, a normal postback event cycle occurs.
A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A> property to indicate the URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the text caption displayed for the button.
Docs.value: The text caption displayed for the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Text%2A> property to indicate the text caption displayed for the button.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
Docs.value: The name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property to indicate the name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
